description:
With a comfortable, supportive suspension system and travel-tuned internal organization, the Fairview Trek 50 is made specifically for female adventure trekkers who plan to spend a lot of time on-trail. Loads of access points make it easy to organize and get at your stuff, and a handy stowable AirCover® deploys to protect your pack from baggage handlers and downpours.

  • Ruggedly built with 420-denier recycled nylon packcloth, with 500-denier reinforced bottom panel
  • Comfortable edgeless padded mesh straps have 10cm of adjustability
  • Airspeed® adjustable back panel is tensioned mesh, allowing air to circulate against your back
  • Soft padded mesh hipbelt is designed for heavy loads
  • Adjustable sternum strap with safety whistle
  • Padded tubular side grab handle
  • Large front panel access for easy packing
  • Multi-function padded sleeve carries a hydration reservoir or tablet/laptop
  • Vertical quick access pocket on front panel
  • Zippered lower compartment with removable divider
  • Zippered top and hipbelt pockets for travel essentials
  • Stretch-woven side pockets
  • Dual internal compression straps with fabric wings keep clothes organized
  • Removable sleeping pad straps
  • Stowable AirCover® protects bag in transit and doubles as a raincover
  • Compatible with the Farpoint/Fairview® Daypack or Daylite® packs
name: Osprey Fairview Trek 50L Travel Pack - Women's
